parameters.name: Is2Sided
parameters.description: True if the rib is double-sided rib, false if the rib is single sided; a double-sided rib thickens on both sides of the sketch

parameters.name: ReverseThicknessDir
parameters.description: For single-sided ribs, the direction thickened is the opposite side of the sketch normal

parameters.name: ReferenceEdgeIndex
parameters.description: Edge in the sketch to us to determine the material direction and for draft reference; when the rib is drafted, the mid point of this edge maintains the thickness value; other points on the rib may have a different thickness due to the draft

parameters.name: ReverseMaterialDir
parameters.description: Which direction the rib has material; it is on one side or the order side of the reference edge base on this flag

parameters.name: IsDrafted
parameters.description: True if the rib is drafted, false if not

parameters.name: DraftOutward
parameters.description: True to draft outwards, false to not

parameters.name: DraftAngle
parameters.description: Draft angle to apply to the rib

parameters.name: IsNormToSketch
parameters.description: True if the rib is normal to the sketch, false if the rib is parallel to the sketch

title: IModelDoc2.InsertRib2
signature:
void InsertRib2( 
   System.Boolean
Is2Sided
,
   System.Boolean
ReverseThicknessDir
,
   System.Double
Thickness
,
   System.Int32
ReferenceEdgeIndex
,
   System.Boolean
ReverseMaterialDir
,
   System.Boolean
IsDrafted
,
   System.Boolean
DraftOutward
,
   System.Double
DraftAngle
,
   System.Boolean
IsNormToSketch
)

parameters.name: Is2Sided
parameters.description: True if the rib is double-sided rib, false if the rib is single sided; a double-sided rib thickens on both sides of the sketch

parameters.name: ReverseThicknessDir
parameters.description: For single-sided ribs, the direction thickened is the opposite side of the sketch normal

parameters.name: ReferenceEdgeIndex
parameters.description: Edge in the sketch to us to determine the material direction and for draft reference; when the rib is drafted, the mid point of this edge maintains the thickness value; other points on the rib may have a different thickness due to the draft

parameters.name: ReverseMaterialDir
parameters.description: Which direction the rib has material; it is on one side or the order side of the reference edge base on this flag

parameters.name: IsDrafted
parameters.description: True if the rib is drafted, false if not

parameters.name: DraftOutward
parameters.description: True to draft outwards, false to not

parameters.name: DraftAngle
parameters.description: Draft angle to apply to the rib

parameters.name: IsNormToSketch
parameters.description: True if the rib is normal to the sketch, false if the rib is parallel to the sketch

remarks:
This method supports multibody parts. You must select the input body by calling
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
and setting its Mark argument to 1 before calling this method.
